free_games: Welcome to Botany Manor, a stately home in 19th century England. You play as inhabitant Arabella Greene, a retired botanist. Explore your house and gardens, filled with research, to figure out the ideal habitat of forgotten flora.
Step back in time and forward into battle with the Poison Retro Set, inspired by the electrifying Arcade Season.
The Darkside Detective A Fumble in the Dark
Join Detective McQueen as he puzzles his way through 6 cases, risking life and pixelated limb to solve the macabre mysteries that plague the poor town.

Lose yourself in the dystopian world of New York, 2329. In this interactive noir story, lead the investigation using advanced technology as Detective James Karra, who risks it all in pursuit of a serial killer targeting the city’s elite.
“The hospital was empty. Quiet, and brighter than usual... like waking up on a snow day. But I didn't feel cold. I didn't feel much of anything.”

STALCRAFT: X is a free-to-play MMOFPS with RPG elements.

Start exploring the world of the Zone with a Starter Pack. It includes everything you need for your initial raids: a 7-day Premium, weapons, armor, artifacts, and cosmetics.
